product_name: Thule Sprint Fork Mount Bike Carrier
long_description: The adjustable Thule Sprint Fork mount fits a variety of vehicles and provides superb security and convenience when transporting your bike. With tool-free mounting, the SonicHead fork mount and the D-shape, low-profile aluminum tray deliver a durable, stable platform. Fork mount fits most disc brakes and suspension combinations with standard 9mm axles. AcuTight Knob clicks when you reach the optimal hold, ensuring bike is secured to the rack. Easy-to-use and lockable stainless-steel skewer with an oversize lever provides secure loading and unloading. Using Thule One-Key System lock cylinders (lock cores sold separately), lock bike to carrier and carrier to rack. Telescoping wheel tray moves in and out, securely fitting bikes with a wheelbase up to 48 in. and tire widths up to 2.6 in.; adjustment provides additional hatch clearance. Thule Sprint Fork mount has blue elastomer road damping pads that are embedded to help absorb road forces and vibration to protect your bike. Rear ratcheting wheel strap holds rear wheel securely to tray and features road dampening technology for shock absorption; compatible with high-profile rims. Fits Thule AeroBlade bars, square bars, round bars and most factory racks right out of the box.
short_description: The adjustable Thule Sprint Fork mount fits a variety of vehicles and provides superb security and convenience when transporting your bike.
